data.name: Leaving Lyndow Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Leaving Lyndow (Original Sountrack) by Phoenix Glendinning features over 22 minutes of music.

Includes 8 Audio tracks in both FLAC and MP3.

Track List


1. Last Morning (3:09)
2. Forest Walk (3:31)
3. Toma's Farm (2:18)
4. The Teahouse (2:18)
5. Distant Sails (3:58)
6. (Ambience I) (2:33)
7. (Ambience II) (2:20)
8. (Ambience III) (2:07)

Files will be downloaded will go into your Steam directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Leaving Lyndow\OST
